channel.title: New discovery in ‘wave’ type music production!
channel.description: I found out recently that if you play with the tone setting on Face, something really interesting happens... see for yourself... https://app.auxy.co/projects/PVuYH2Iwmc9h9xZNVKqYng==

item.title: New discovery in ‘wave’ type music production!
item.dc:creator: Chaff
item.description:
I’m very sure non piano instruments also behave this way with tone changes but I never documented them before. The reason this is important is that you can change an instrument to be something completely different

Read full topic
item.source: New discovery in ‘wave’ type music production!

item.title: New discovery in ‘wave’ type music production!

Also, if you add tone wubs it sounds like pac man.
